body_html:
import tensorflow as tf

data = tf.placeholder("float", shape=[1, 8, 8, 1])
conv = tf.nn.max_pool(data, [1, 2, 2, 1], [1, 2, 2, 1], padding='SAME')

print(conv.get_shape())  # prints (1, 4, 4, 1), but should be (1, 5, 5, 1)
body_text:
import tensorflow as tf

data = tf.placeholder("float", shape=[1, 8, 8, 1])
conv = tf.nn.max_pool(data, [1, 2, 2, 1], [1, 2, 2, 1], padding='SAME')

print(conv.get_shape())  # prints (1, 4, 4, 1), but should be (1, 5, 5, 1)
body:
```
import tensorflow as tf

data = tf.placeholder("float", shape=[1, 8, 8, 1])
conv = tf.nn.max_pool(data, [1, 2, 2, 1], [1, 2, 2, 1], padding='SAME')

print(conv.get_shape())  # prints (1, 4, 4, 1), but should be (1, 5, 5, 1)
```
